notes:
This resource comprises multilingual lexicon entries used for the translation of specific IT domain expressions. This gazetteer has been collected from four different sources: VLC,
 LibreOffice and KDE localization projects and IT domain Wikipedia articles.
title: QTLeap Specialized lexicons
